analysis.key_quote: This rule would open the door to converting certain career civil servants—many of whom are subject-matter experts in law, finance, and regulation—into at-will employees without due process, transparency, or the ability to appeal adverse actions.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about due process, the integrity of public service, and the potential politicization of civil service roles, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
